posts.post_content:
The most fun thing to do with Phage is imprint her on a [Summoner's Egg](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Summoner's Egg) or [Clone Shell](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Clone Shell). Give the card to your opponent somehow ([Bazaar Trader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bazaar Trader), [Legerdemain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Legerdemain) -- whatever). Then simply kill the Shell / Egg.
  
   
It's roughly as fun AND reliable as playing your state lottery.
posts.html:
The most fun thing to do with Phage is imprint her on a Summoner's Egg or Clone Shell. Give the card to your opponent somehow (Bazaar Trader, Legerdemain -- whatever). Then simply kill the Shell / Egg.

It's roughly as fun AND reliable as playing your state lottery.

posts.post_content:
This + [Viridian Longbow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Viridian Longbow) = you're a moron. Pinging is not combat damage. Never has been, never will be.  
  
About the best thing that can be done with her is making her unblockable, and there are a billion different ways to do that in just about any color. Besides, if your opponent finds out you're playing with this card, I'm sure they'll pull out any number of ways to get rid of her. [Condemn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Condemn) ftw.  
  
That being said, I've had so much fun blowing this card up in multiplayer it's not even funny anymore. Someone has already commented on dropping an O-ring on her, then disenchanting it. What's more fun is dropping the O-ring, and watch them cringe every time someone ends their turn, wondering which player is going to blow the ring up and make that player lose the game. There are just too many easy ways to make this card backfire to make it worth running, as well as too many ways to get rid of her. Thankfully, creature removal/counterspells are in... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
This + Viridian Longbow = you're a moron. Pinging is not combat damage. Never has been, never will be.

About the best thing that can be done with her is making her unblockable, and there are a billion different ways to do that in just about any color. Besides, if your opponent finds out you're playing with this card, I'm sure they'll pull out any number of ways to get rid of her. Condemn ftw.

That being said, I've had so much fun blowing this card up in multiplayer it's not even funny anymore. Someone has already commented on dropping an O-ring on her, then disenchanting it. What's more fun is dropping the O-ring, and watch them cringe every time someone ends their turn, wondering which player is going to blow the ring up and make that player lose the game. There are just too many easy ways to make this card backfire to make it worth running, as well as too many ways to get rid of her. Thankfully, creature removal/counterspells are in... (see all)
